question: Indian Navy has cancelled the Contract with which company regarding Naval Offshore patrol vessels?
explanation:
The Indian Navy has cancelled Reliance Naval and Engineering Ltdâ€™s (RNEL) Rs 2,500-crore naval offshore patrol vessels (NPOVs) contract.
The contract is said to be cancelled due to the delay in delivery of the vessels. In 2011, the contract to build five warships was signed with the company. RNEL is going through the debt resolution process in the National Company Law Tribunal (NCLT).
